wikipedia_page.main: Luke Rayner is a British, London-based guitarist and record producer. He is best known for being part of the reformed Leaf Hound. Since joining Leaf Hound his guitar style and ability have been praised by the music press; Classic Rock calling him, "a real discovery" and Metal Hammer, "a guitar hero in the making". He is the older brother of the fashion photographer Ben Rayner

response: In 2004 Peter French put together a new incarnation of the band with Luke Rayner on guitar. In 2006 they released a limited 7" on Rise Above Records featuring a live version of "Freelance Fiend" recorded in Soho, London in September 2005. The b-side is also taken from the same recording. In 2007 Leaf Hound released 'Unleashed' on 'Rare Recording'. According to the band's website, a live album is set for future release.
